---

debate: Quais os verdadeiros valores da sociedade?

---

Molequinho Troll e narco-comunista diz que a polícia é a verdadeira arruaceira no Inglaterra! HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA HUA !!!
